titleStmt.title: The Churches victory in a message from heaven to the saints on early / by a fat, pious and learned divine, immediately before his death, to incourage all those who are now in armes for the defence of Christ and his gospell.
titleStmt.author: Fat, pious and learned divine.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London for Mi. F.,

notesStmt.note: "Mi. F." is Miles Flesher--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
